subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams scored a season-high 26 points in Tuesday night’s victory over Cleveland, even as tough frontcourt players, like Anderson Varejao, gave the Nets a bit of trouble.
snippet: Deron Williams scored a season-high 26 points in Tuesday night’s victory over Cleveland, even as tough frontcourt players, like Anderson Varejao, gave the Nets a bit of trouble.
